ygData.subject: Re: Test server info.. - Bard Meditate
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually I got this just one time in N Ro, while fear/chaining a sand giant. I have not gotten it since. Rokenn ...
ygData.messageBody:
Actually I got this just one time in N Ro, while fear/chaining a sand giant.
I have not gotten it since.

Rokenn



>From: "Eric Cathell" <embroidery@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Test server info.. - Bard Meditate
>Date: Sun, 9 Jan 2000 09:37:40 -0800
>
>Doubt this applies to bards but my necro is now getting a message when fear
>wears off...nice..hehh
>
>Cethan
>----- Original Message -----

>To: <eqbards@onelist.com>

>Subject: [eqbards] Test server info.. - Bard Meditate
>

> >

> > On the test server bards now have meditate, to memorize spells faster.
>This is from a person I group with, so can't give you first hand knowledge.
>Also, I haven't played my bard in quite awhile so can't remember how
>lullaby
>reported back to the player, but the bard I was with say they are getting
>messages when lullaby is resisted... again it seems to me that that is not
>a new thing, but posting it just in case.
> >
> > Kassao, 31st bard, Tarew Marr
